post:
Aquarius Storage is proud to announce its virtual private server lineup. To celebrate the launch, we're offering jaw dropping prices on our VPS packages for the time being. Do not let these low prices scare you away. We are a stable shared/reseller web hosting provider looking to get a jump start on our VPS lineup.

Aquarius Storage Virtual Private Server nodes are controlled using the HyperVM VPS Control Panel and are powered by OpenVZ Virtualization. All Virtual Private Servers will be provisioned within an hours or less unless additional fraud scanning is required. Having your own Virtual Private Server will provide you with a much higher level of speed, and reliability without the price of a dedicated server. Each managed VPS is a truly unique and private environment with its own guaranteed resources and full root access.
